original: AHLBERG, Erik Karl Sigfrid, Direktör, Göteborg, f Våmb, Skarab l, 30/10 87 av öv.-löjtn S A o h h, gm Ellen Durling. Lunds-bergs sk, hdlsinst. Anst i Engl, Tyskl o Argentina t 15, kont.chef fma Hjalmar Krön-lund Gbg 15—23, övert denna 24 o ombild den t Hjalmar Kronlund AB 32. Firman grund 1896.
translated: AHLBERG, Erik Karl Sigfrid, Director, Gothenburg, born in Våmb, Skaraborg county, on October 30, 1887, to Lieutenant Colonel S A and his wife h h, married to Ellen Durling. Educated at Lundsbergs school, commercial institute. Employed in England, Germany, and Argentina until 1915, then became the CEO of Hjalmar Krön-lund in Gothenburg from 1915 to 1923. Took over the company in 1924 and transformed it into Hjalmar Kronlund AB in 1932. The firm was established in 1896.

structured.name: Erik Karl Sigfrid Ahlberg
structured.description: Erik Karl Sigfrid Ahlberg was born on October 30, 1887, in Våmb, Skaraborg County, Sweden. He was the director of Hjalmar Kronlund AB, a firm established in 1896. From 1915 to 1923, he served as the CEO of Hjalmar Krön-lund in Gothenburg. In 1924, he took over the company and transformed it into Hjalmar Kronlund AB in 1932. Erik's educational background includes attending Lundsbergs school, a commercial institute. He was married to Ellen Durling.

career.occupational_title: Ombild den t Hjalmar Kronlund AB
